title: The Perfect Roommate
description: She's my roommate.I know how she takes her tea, how she organizes her closet.I know when she goes to bed each night, what she eats for breakfast, the passcode on her phone.I know she calls her mother on Mondays, takes barre on Thursdays, and meets her friends for drinks on Fridays.But more important than any of that ... I know what she did.
author: Minka Kent
